function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"False information regarding infectious diseases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of infection through face-to-face contact during delivery of diagnosis letter","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate response to infectious disease outbreaks","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of sars-cov-2 through respiratory droplets and infectious aerosols","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Asymptomatic individuals spreading the virus","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Declaration of a pandemic by who","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Widespread contagious disease transmission","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid spread from animals to humans","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Wearable sensor technology may provide a false sense of security, leading to decreased vigilance in following other necessary precautions.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inaccurate readings from wearable sensors may lead to misdiagnosis or delayed diagnosis of diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Dependence on wearable technology for disease detection may lead to neglect of traditional diagnostic methods and clinical assessment.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Validation studies for wearables have not been conducted, creating obstacles for healthcare workers regarding their clinical utility.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"False-positive results from wearables create risks and require greater effort for correct interpretation of the data.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Patients are concerned with the privacy and security of their data when using wearables, as breaching of digital network security can lead to data exposure.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of ehealth wearables for covid-19 data interpretation and monitoring.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Utilization of wearable devices in the healthcare system.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of covid-19 through the handling and sharing of wearable devices","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Wearable devices and unobtrusive sensing technologies may not accurately monitor early symptoms of covid-19 or common health conditions, leading to misdiagnosis or delayed treatment.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Role of cloud, edge, and fog computing in telehealth monitoring systems may pose security and privacy risks for the sensitive health data transmitted and stored.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Wearable devices used for maintaining social distancing and contact tracing may raise concerns about data privacy and surveillance.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of wearables to monitor covid-19 symptoms may lead to inaccurate readings or interpretations, resulting in misdiagnosis or inappropriate treatment.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on wearables for remote assessment of covid-19 patients may overlook other critical symptoms or conditions that require in-person evaluation.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Privacy and security risks associated with the transmission and storage of sensitive health data from wearables to cloud-based platforms.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High cost of systems makes them less affordable to the public, limiting access to healthcare technology.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Regulatory approvals and medical device clearance processes may delay the implementation of healthcare technology.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited availability of multimodal sensing systems for covid-19 symptoms hinders comprehensive disease monitoring and prevention.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Sharing of temperature data with mobile app via bluetooth can lead to unauthorized access of sensitive health information.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Wearable devices may not be accurate, leading to incorrect temperature readings and potential misdiagnosis or improper treatment.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of pulse oximeter sensors at non-standard locations or with inaccurate sensors can lead to false readings and misinterpretation of oxygen saturation levels.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Introduction of wearable pulse oximeter devices","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of respiratory rate monitoring for disease evaluation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cough and lung sound monitoring for contagious disease symptoms","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Monitoring dry cough for covid-19 detection and prevention.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Traditional ecg monitoring systems may increase staff-to-patient contact, leading to potential cross-infections.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cuff-based blood pressure monitoring by medical staff increases their work load and the possibility of them becoming infected.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Continuous and remote monitoring of bp is essential for covid-19-positive patients to prevent sudden events and reduce cross-contamination.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Obstacles exist in achieving accurate bp estimations, especially when tracking responses to medications, due to the dynamic nature and variability of bp in different individuals.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Aggregate data from wearables contributing to improved public health responses.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of ai and deep learning for covid-19 diagnosis and prevention.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Forecasting pandemic spread using ai and data analysis.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Smartwatch data collection and heuristic model used for disease detection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Application of ai in medical research and social context during pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Machine learning prediction of infection and severity risk for covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of infection through wearable technology","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on ai for outcome prediction","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on remote monitoring and data transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure of healthcare systems due to resource mismanagement","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate access to healthcare facilities leading to increased travel for diagnosis and testing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of efficient data and application accessibility for healthcare management","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to proximity of edge and fog computing to iot devices","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
